Author: RevolutionaryRest5
Text: It's great lacking body fat for my endocrine system to function properly, yet carrying absolutely useless water weight all the time lol.   I googled a lot and I was left with the impression that I was the only one that retains water so often, even though I know it's not possible.

Author: itsoobak
Text: The same thing happens to me too! And not just on a menstrual cycle but even just when I get hot, i’ll look at my legs in the morning and they’ll be fine and then i’ll go outside and BOOM bloated. God hates us that’s why :/
